channel.title: commercial company on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in commercial company on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
IFTTT Logo
If This Then That is a private commercial company that runs services that allow a user to program a response to events in the world. IFTTT has partnerships with different service providers that supply event notifications to IFTTT and execute commands that implement the responses. Some event and command interfaces are simply public APIs. The programs, called applets, are simple and created graphically. Users can create programs and otherwise control IFTTT with a web interface or iOS or Android application.
You can download theIFTTTlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: IFTTT
item.description: If This Then That is a private commercial company that runs services that allow a user to program a response to events in the world. IFTTT has partnerships with different service providers that supply event notifications to IFTTT and execute commands that implement the responses. Some event and command interfaces are simply public APIs. The programs, called applets, are simple and created graphically. Users can create programs and otherwise control IFTTT with a web interface or iOS or Android application.
